temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.content: STEC optimal temperature of growth is 36-40°C but it can survive between 6°C to 45.5°C.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.content: STEC can survive in aerobic and anaerobic environments.

ph.title: pH
ph.content: STEC can survive in a wide range of pH conditions between 4.4 to 9 and grow optimally at pH 6-7.

humidity.title: Water
humidity.content: STEC can grow with a water activity (aw) > 0.995.

salinity.title: Salinity
salinity.content: The optimal salinity for STEC is 0% but it can tolerate untill 8.5%
